replies.msg:
Charles Barkley said that Adam Silver needs to step in to prevent Anthony Davis from getting traded to the Los Angeles Lakers.

“Adam Silver needs to block that trade. I don’t like what the Lakers are doing. I don’t think it’s right. Rich Paul got mad at me because I said a month ago, I said, ‘Oh the fix is in. Anthony Davis is going to the Lakers.’ This was before all these rumors started. He didn’t like me saying the fix was in. The fix has been in," stated Barkley on "Inside the NBA" on Thursday night.

Barkley then made his final point, adding that "we cannot have agents and players colluding to stack super teams”.
Jason Kidd is in the discussion to be the next coach of the Los Angeles Lakers if they decide to move on from Luke Walton, according to Ric Bucher.

Washington Wizards owner Ted Leonsis called the idea of tanking "offensive" and said that the Wizards are focused on making the playoffs this year.

"You have to go to the players, the coach, the staff and say, 'Do we have enough to make the playoffs?' And to a person, I was told, 'Yes we do,'" said Leonsis.

Leonsis added that the team will not trade Bradley Beal, John Wall, or Otto Porter Jr.
